EmailTemplate.description: mail will be sent prior one day to, on whicj session is scheduled
EmailTemplate.name: Reminder For Rescheduled Session
EmailTemplate.subject: Reminder for Rescheduled Session
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Contact.Name},
A session is Rescheduled which starts on {!Session.Date} at {!Session.StartTime} and the agenda will be {!Session.Agenda}.Be available for the session.
